attributes.action: Stop the wasting of taxpayers money within local and national government departments. Reward departments for coming in under budget not penalise them!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year prior to end of financial year. government departments all over this land have to spend there yearly budget otherwise the surplus amounts will be taken away from their next years planned budget.  This system encourages waste and is why we see councils rushing around painting pavements painted pink and installing car wrecking speed humps every February and March.  Waste goes on in all departments and I have benifitted from this in the past with products being purchased to use up the spare cash.
